text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the Intel Core R5. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Eluktronics N950KP6 Premium VR Ready Gaming Laptop - Intel G4560 Dual Core Desktop CPU 6GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce 1060 GPU 15.6” 72% NTSC Full HD IPS RGB Backlit Keys 1TB 7200RPM Hard Drive + 8GB RAM!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The Intel Core R5 in the Eluktronics N950KP6 Premium VR Ready Gaming Laptop - Intel G4560 Dual Core Desktop CPU 6GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce 1060 GPU 15.6” 72% NTSC Full HD IPS RGB Backlit Keys 1TB 7200RPM Hard Drive + 8GB RAM is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The Intel Core R5 is good, but I expected a bit more from the keyboard on the Eluktronics N950KP6 Premium VR Ready Gaming Laptop - Intel G4560 Dual Core Desktop CPU 6GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce 1060 GPU 15.6” 72% NTSC Full HD IPS RGB Backlit Keys 1TB 7200RPM Hard Drive + 8GB RAM. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
